onboarding.welcome_desc: An AI-powered companion diary focused on soul depth and memory autonomy.
onboarding.philosophy_desc: BaiShou is more than a diary; it's an extension of your inner consciousness. Keeping every moment alive through AI-assisted compression.
onboarding.compression_desc: We believe memory's weight lies in depth, not redundancy. Cascade compression distills daily entries into life's highlights.
onboarding.ai_setup_desc: BaiShou itself does not store your AI keys. Configure standard OpenAI compatible protocols to start your soul dialogue.
onboarding.privacy_desc: Your data is stored only locally. With end-to-end sync, you maintain complete control over your memory sovereignty.

privacy.title: Privacy & Philosophy
privacy.data_ownership_desc: BaiShou believes memory is a soul extension. Your data is stored locally. Unauthorized uploads never occur beyond your chosen AI/Sync providers.
privacy.local_first_desc: Write diaries offline seamlessly. AI summaries are generated on-demand; we don't store your generated texts.
privacy.transparency_desc: Supports end-to-end data export. Take your memories with you anytime via ZIP or sync to your own S3/WebDAV space.
